general.name: spfibermap
general.description: This file contains a consolidated form of the fiber-to-target mapping from either Plate plugmap files or FPS confSummary files. The raw mapping files are supplemented with additional information and converted to a unified data model for use by the pipeline.

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: DR19
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

general.naming_convention: $BOSS_SPECTRO_REDUX/[RUN2D]/[FIELD]/spfibermap-[FIELD]-[MJD].fits or spfibermap-112360-60000.fits but with regex pattern matches

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

PLUGDIR.name: PLUGDIR
PLUGDIR.description: path to confSummary or plugmap file

ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN.name: ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN
ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN.description: Run of Robostrategy for this FPS design

JAEGER_VERSION.name: JAEGER_VERSION
JAEGER_VERSION.description: Version of Jaeger used for this configuration

COORDIO_VERSION.name: COORDIO_VERSION
COORDIO_VERSION.description: Version of coordIO used for this configuration

KAIJU_VERSION.name: KAIJU_VERSION
KAIJU_VERSION.description: Version of Kaiju used for this configuration

DESIGN_ID.name: DESIGN_ID
DESIGN_ID.description: FPS design ID associated with configuration

FIELD_ID.name: FIELD_ID
FIELD_ID.description: The field ID that defines the pointing

FOCAL_SCALE.name: FOCAL_SCALE
FOCAL_SCALE.description: scale factor between xy focal and xy wok

EPOCH.name: EPOCH
EPOCH.description: JD at which the configuration was generated

OBSTIME.name: OBSTIME
OBSTIME.description: TAI date of the observation (matches epoch)

MJD.name: MJD
MJD.description: MJD of the observation in the SDSS style

TEMPERATURE.name: TEMPERATURE
TEMPERATURE.description: Temperature at the time of the FPS observation

IS_DITHERED.name: IS_DITHERED
IS_DITHERED.description: Is this a dithered FPS configuration

DITHER_RADIUS.name: DITHER_RADIUS
DITHER_RADIUS.description: radius for uniform distribution around parent

CLONED_FROM.name: CLONED_FROM
CLONED_FROM.description: previous configuration id for cloned configuration

FVC_CENTROID_METHOD.name: FVC_CENTROID_METHOD
FVC_CENTROID_METHOD.description: Method used to centroid FVC images for robot positioning

FVC_IMAGE_PATH.name: FVC_IMAGE_PATH
FVC_IMAGE_PATH.description: Path to FVC image for this FPS configuration

POINTING.name: POINTING
POINTING.description: which pointing (1-indexed) this target is associated with

HA.name: HA
HA.description: hour angle for design (- = rising, + = setting)

HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN.name: HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN
HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN.description: min HA for no hole offsets from refraction

HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX.name: HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX
HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX.description: max HA for no hole offsets from refraction

PROGRAMNAME.name: PROGRAMNAME
PROGRAMNAME.description: Program Name associated with the Plate

DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT.name: DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT
DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT.description: effective plate scale of design in altitude

DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ.name: DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ
DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ.description: effective plate scale of design in azimuth

DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE.name: DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE
DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE.description: plate parallactic angle (deg E of N)

NPOINTINGS.name: NPOINTINGS
NPOINTINGS.description: num of designed pointings of plate; 1+ exp

NOFFSETS.name: NOFFSETS
NOFFSETS.description: number of offsets within each exposure

MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: Does the plate have a maximum number of skies we want to assign per fiber block

GFIBERTYPE.name: GFIBERTYPE
GFIBERTYPE.description: type of Plate guide fibers to assume (old "gfiber" or new "gfiber2")

GUIDETYPE.name: GUIDETYPE
GUIDETYPE.description: for each Plate pointing, the source to search for guide fibers from (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

GUIDENUMS1.name: GUIDENUMS1
GUIDENUMS1.description: for each Plate pointing, the source to search for guide fibers from (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

GUIDEMAG_MINMAX.name: GUIDEMAG_MINMAX
GUIDEMAG_MINMAX.description: minimum and maximum g-band magnitudes for Plate guide stars (default: [13, 15.5])

NGUIDEMAX.name: NGUIDEMAX
NGUIDEMAX.description: maximum number of possible plate guide stars to track, otherwise tracks 10s of thousands at low b (default: infinite)

FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED.name: FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED
FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for BOSS

BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED.name: BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED
BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED.description: buffer to include outside boss ferrule for checking for conflicts

FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.name: FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED
FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for apoggee

BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.name: BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED
BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.description: buffer to include outside apogeeferrule for checking for conflict

FERRULESIZEGUIDE.name: FERRULESIZEGUIDE
FERRULESIZEGUIDE.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for guide fiber

BUFFERSIZEGUIDE.name: BUFFERSIZEGUIDE
BUFFERSIZEGUIDE.description: buffer to include outside guide fiber ferrule for checking for conflict

PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS.name: PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS
PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS.description: specify what instruments we want plate design to find standards for

STANDARDTYPE.name: STANDARDTYPE
STANDARDTYPE.description: for each plate pointing, type of standard to find (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS", or "None" --- in fact, any value other than SDSS or 2MASS is equivalent to "None")

PLATEDESIGNSKIES.name: PLATEDESIGNSKIES
PLATEDESIGNSKIES.description: specify what instruments we want plate design to find skies for, if any

SKYTYPE.name: SKYTYPE
SKYTYPE.description: for each pointing, type of skies to find (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

PLUGMAPSTYLE.name: PLUGMAPSTYLE
PLUGMAPSTYLE.description: type of plugmap file to create (default "plplugmap")

BOSSMAGTYPE.name: BOSSMAGTYPE
BOSSMAGTYPE.description: type of magnitude used for fiber magnitudes for BOSS targets

POINTING_NAME.name: POINTING_NAME
POINTING_NAME.description: name of the plate pointings ('A B C D E F')

MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA.name: MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA
MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA.description: set HA limits (ha_observable_min, haobservable_max) to guarantee no offsets greater than this limit, in arcsec (platedesign v1_27 and above)

COLLECTFACTOR.name: COLLECTFACTOR
COLLECTFACTOR.description: oversampling factor for collecting skies and standards; to ensure pluggability, should be at least 5 (default: 5)

PLATETYPE.name: PLATETYPE
PLATETYPE.description: type of plateDefault file to use

RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES.name: RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES
RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES.description: for APOGEE, do not break target classes up into bright/medium/faint.

TARGETTYPES.name: TARGETTYPES
TARGETTYPES.description: types of targets which the file will specify a certain number of (allowed: "science", "sky", "standard")

MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: specify if we have a minimum number of skies we want to assign per Plate fiber block (default 0)

MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: specify if we have a minimum number of standards we want to assign per Plate fiber block (default 0)

THETA.name: THETA
THETA.description: position angle of plate design (0 in practice)

PLATERUN.name: PLATERUN
PLATERUN.description: name of platerun this file was part of

PLATEDESIGN_VERSION.name: PLATEDESIGN_VERSION
PLATEDESIGN_VERSION.description: version of platedesign used to produce design

FSCANMJD.name: FSCANMJD
FSCANMJD.description: MJD when plugged plate was scanned

FSCANDATE.name: FSCANDATE
FSCANDATE.description: Date when plugged plate was scanned

hdu2.name: CONFSUMMARYF-8872.PAR
hdu2.description: Fiber-to-target mapping for plate plugging or FPS configuration

HOLEID.name: HOLEID
HOLEID.description: Hole ID in which the positioner is sitting

FIBERTYPE.name: FIBERTYPE
FIBERTYPE.description: Type of fibre (APOGEE, BOSS, or Metrology)

ASSIGNED.name: ASSIGNED
ASSIGNED.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target

ON_TARGET.name: ON_TARGET
ON_TARGET.description: Whether this fibre is on target

VALID.name: VALID
VALID.description: alpha and beta angles are valid

DECOLLIDED.name: DECOLLIDED
DECOLLIDED.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it

BADSTDMASK.name: BADSTDMASK
BADSTDMASK.description: Standard rejected by magnitude range of design

SCI_EXPTIME.name: SCI_EXPTIME
SCI_EXPTIME.description: Rescaled Science Exposure Time for offset plate

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: BOSS to assign this target a 'blue' fiber

ALPHA.name: ALPHA
ALPHA.description: The alpha angles of the positioner arms.

BETA.name: BETA
BETA.description: The beta angles of the positioner arms.

XWOK.name: XWOK
XWOK.description: The X value in the FPS WOK coordinates

YWOK.name: YWOK
YWOK.description: The Y value in the FPS WOK coordinates

ZWOK.name: ZWOK
ZWOK.description: The X value in the FPS WOK coordinates

XFOCAL.name: XFOCAL
XFOCAL.description: The X value in focal plane coordinates.

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: The Y value in focal plane coordinates.

RACAT.name: RACAT
RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog Dec in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: Calculated on sky fiber RA including delta_RA

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: Calculated on sky fiber Dec including delta_DEC

DELTA_RA.name: DELTA_RA
DELTA_RA.description: The amount in RA this fiber has been offset

DELTA_DEC.name: DELTA_DEC
DELTA_DEC.description: The amount in Dec this fiber has been offset

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

SPECTROGRAPHID.name: SPECTROGRAPHID
SPECTROGRAPHID.description: Spectrograph to which the fibre is assigned.

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the CATDB_MAG optical magnitudes

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical PSF magnitudes

FIBER2MAG.name: FIBER2MAG
FIBER2MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical Fiber2 magnitudes

CATDB_MAG.name: CATDB_MAG
CATDB_MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] Raw TargetDB magnitudes

WISE_MAG.name: WISE_MAG
WISE_MAG.description: WISE [W1, W2, W3, W4] band magnitudes

GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.name: GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM
GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.description: provenance of photometry in SDSS-V plate design

OBJTYPE.description: Why object was targetted (QSO = Science Target)

SOURCETYPE.description: indicate the nature of the source

OBJID.description: Unique object id from SDSS imaging

CARTON_TO_TARGET_PK.description: SDSS-V Carton_to_Target primary key for SDSSDB

ANCILLARY_TARGET2.description: Targeting bitmask for SDSS-III BOSS Ancillary

RUN.name: RUN
RUN.description: SDSS imaging run, for SDSS imaging targets

RERUN.name: RERUN
RERUN.description: SDSS imaging rerun, for SDSS imaging targets

CAMCOL.name: CAMCOL
CAMCOL.description: SDSS imaging camcol, for SDSS imaging targets

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS imaging field, for SDSS imaging targets

ID.name: ID
ID.description: SDSS imaging id, for SDSS imaging targets

PLUGDIR.name: PLUGDIR
PLUGDIR.description: path to confSummary or plugmap file

ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN.name: ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN
ROBOSTRATEGY_RUN.description: Run of Robostrategy for this FPS design

JAEGER_VERSION.name: JAEGER_VERSION
JAEGER_VERSION.description: Version of Jaeger used for this configuration

COORDIO_VERSION.name: COORDIO_VERSION
COORDIO_VERSION.description: Version of coordIO used for this configuration

KAIJU_VERSION.name: KAIJU_VERSION
KAIJU_VERSION.description: Version of Kaiju used for this configuration

DESIGN_ID.name: DESIGN_ID
DESIGN_ID.description: FPS design ID associated with configuration

FIELD_ID.name: FIELD_ID
FIELD_ID.description: The field ID that defines the pointing

FOCAL_SCALE.name: FOCAL_SCALE
FOCAL_SCALE.description: scale factor between xy focal and xy wok

EPOCH.name: EPOCH
EPOCH.description: JD at which the configuration was generated

OBSTIME.name: OBSTIME
OBSTIME.description: TAI date of the observation (matches epoch)

MJD.name: MJD
MJD.description: MJD of the observation in the SDSS style

TEMPERATURE.name: TEMPERATURE
TEMPERATURE.description: Temperature at the time of the FPS observation

IS_DITHERED.name: IS_DITHERED
IS_DITHERED.description: Is this a dithered FPS configuration

DITHER_RADIUS.name: DITHER_RADIUS
DITHER_RADIUS.description: radius for uniform distribution around parent

CLONED_FROM.name: CLONED_FROM
CLONED_FROM.description: previous configuration id for cloned configuration

FVC_CENTROID_METHOD.name: FVC_CENTROID_METHOD
FVC_CENTROID_METHOD.description: Method used to centroid FVC images for robot positioning

FVC_IMAGE_PATH.name: FVC_IMAGE_PATH
FVC_IMAGE_PATH.description: Path to FVC image for this FPS configuration

POINTING.name: POINTING
POINTING.description: which pointing (1-indexed) this target is associated with

HA.name: HA
HA.description: hour angle for design (- = rising, + = setting)

HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN.name: HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN
HA_OBSERVABLE_MIN.description: min HA for no hole offsets from refraction

HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX.name: HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX
HA_OBSERVABLE_MAX.description: max HA for no hole offsets from refraction

PROGRAMNAME.name: PROGRAMNAME
PROGRAMNAME.description: Program Name associated with the Plate

DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT.name: DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT
DESIGN_PLATESCALE_ALT.description: effective plate scale of design in altitude

DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ.name: DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ
DESIGN_PLATESCALE_AZ.description: effective plate scale of design in azimuth

DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE.name: DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE
DESIGN_PARALLACTIC_ANGLE.description: plate parallactic angle (deg E of N)

NPOINTINGS.name: NPOINTINGS
NPOINTINGS.description: num of designed pointings of plate; 1+ exp

NOFFSETS.name: NOFFSETS
NOFFSETS.description: number of offsets within each exposure

MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MAXSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: Does the plate have a maximum number of skies we want to assign per fiber block

GFIBERTYPE.name: GFIBERTYPE
GFIBERTYPE.description: type of Plate guide fibers to assume (old "gfiber" or new "gfiber2")

GUIDETYPE.name: GUIDETYPE
GUIDETYPE.description: for each Plate pointing, the source to search for guide fibers from (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

GUIDENUMS1.name: GUIDENUMS1
GUIDENUMS1.description: for each Plate pointing, the source to search for guide fibers from (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

GUIDEMAG_MINMAX.name: GUIDEMAG_MINMAX
GUIDEMAG_MINMAX.description: minimum and maximum g-band magnitudes for Plate guide stars (default: [13, 15.5])

NGUIDEMAX.name: NGUIDEMAX
NGUIDEMAX.description: maximum number of possible plate guide stars to track, otherwise tracks 10s of thousands at low b (default: infinite)

FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED.name: FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED
FERRULESIZEBOSS_SHARED.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for BOSS

BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED.name: BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED
BUFFERSIZEBOSS_SHARED.description: buffer to include outside boss ferrule for checking for conflicts

FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.name: FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED
FERRULESIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for apoggee

BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.name: BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED
BUFFERSIZEAPOGEE_SHARED.description: buffer to include outside apogeeferrule for checking for conflict

FERRULESIZEGUIDE.name: FERRULESIZEGUIDE
FERRULESIZEGUIDE.description: diameter of plate ferrule in mm for guide fiber

BUFFERSIZEGUIDE.name: BUFFERSIZEGUIDE
BUFFERSIZEGUIDE.description: buffer to include outside guide fiber ferrule for checking for conflict

PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS.name: PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS
PLATEDESIGNSTANDARDS.description: specify what instruments we want plate design to find standards for

STANDARDTYPE.name: STANDARDTYPE
STANDARDTYPE.description: for each plate pointing, type of standard to find (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS", or "None" --- in fact, any value other than SDSS or 2MASS is equivalent to "None")

PLATEDESIGNSKIES.name: PLATEDESIGNSKIES
PLATEDESIGNSKIES.description: specify what instruments we want plate design to find skies for, if any

SKYTYPE.name: SKYTYPE
SKYTYPE.description: for each pointing, type of skies to find (can be "SDSS" or "2MASS")

PLUGMAPSTYLE.name: PLUGMAPSTYLE
PLUGMAPSTYLE.description: type of plugmap file to create (default "plplugmap")

BOSSMAGTYPE.name: BOSSMAGTYPE
BOSSMAGTYPE.description: type of magnitude used for fiber magnitudes for BOSS targets

POINTING_NAME.name: POINTING_NAME
POINTING_NAME.description: name of the plate pointings ('A B C D E F')

MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA.name: MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA
MAX_OFF_FIBER_FOR_HA.description: set HA limits (ha_observable_min, haobservable_max) to guarantee no offsets greater than this limit, in arcsec (platedesign v1_27 and above)

COLLECTFACTOR.name: COLLECTFACTOR
COLLECTFACTOR.description: oversampling factor for collecting skies and standards; to ensure pluggability, should be at least 5 (default: 5)

PLATETYPE.name: PLATETYPE
PLATETYPE.description: type of plateDefault file to use

RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES.name: RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES
RELAXED_FIBER_CLASSES.description: for APOGEE, do not break target classes up into bright/medium/faint.

TARGETTYPES.name: TARGETTYPES
TARGETTYPES.description: types of targets which the file will specify a certain number of (allowed: "science", "sky", "standard")

MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MINSKYINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: specify if we have a minimum number of skies we want to assign per Plate fiber block (default 0)

MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.name: MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED
MINSTANDARDINBLOCKBOSS_SHARED.description: specify if we have a minimum number of standards we want to assign per Plate fiber block (default 0)

THETA.name: THETA
THETA.description: position angle of plate design (0 in practice)

PLATERUN.name: PLATERUN
PLATERUN.description: name of platerun this file was part of

PLATEDESIGN_VERSION.name: PLATEDESIGN_VERSION
PLATEDESIGN_VERSION.description: version of platedesign used to produce design

FSCANMJD.name: FSCANMJD
FSCANMJD.description: MJD when plugged plate was scanned

FSCANDATE.name: FSCANDATE
FSCANDATE.description: Date when plugged plate was scanned

hdu2.name: CONFSUMMARYF-8872.PAR
hdu2.description: Fiber-to-target mapping for plate plugging or FPS configuration

HOLEID.name: HOLEID
HOLEID.description: Hole ID in which the positioner is sitting

FIBERTYPE.name: FIBERTYPE
FIBERTYPE.description: Type of fibre (APOGEE, BOSS, or Metrology)

ASSIGNED.name: ASSIGNED
ASSIGNED.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target

ON_TARGET.name: ON_TARGET
ON_TARGET.description: Whether this fibre is on target

VALID.name: VALID
VALID.description: alpha and beta angles are valid

DECOLLIDED.name: DECOLLIDED
DECOLLIDED.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it

BADSTDMASK.name: BADSTDMASK
BADSTDMASK.description: Standard rejected by magnitude range of design

SCI_EXPTIME.name: SCI_EXPTIME
SCI_EXPTIME.description: Rescaled Science Exposure Time for offset plate

BLUEFIBER.name: BLUEFIBER
BLUEFIBER.description: BOSS to assign this target a 'blue' fiber

ALPHA.description: The alpha angles of the positioner arms.

BETA.name: BETA
BETA.description: The beta angles of the positioner arms.

XWOK.description: The X value in the FPS WOK coordinates

YFOCAL.name: YFOCAL
YFOCAL.description: The Y value in focal plane coordinates.

RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog Dec in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

RA.name: RA
RA.description: Calculated on sky fiber RA including delta_RA

DEC.name: DEC
DEC.description: Calculated on sky fiber Dec including delta_DEC

DELTA_RA.name: DELTA_RA
DELTA_RA.description: The amount in RA this fiber has been offset

DELTA_DEC.name: DELTA_DEC
DELTA_DEC.description: The amount in Dec this fiber has been offset

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

SPECTROGRAPHID.name: SPECTROGRAPHID
SPECTROGRAPHID.description: Spectrograph to which the fibre is assigned.

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the CATDB_MAG optical magnitudes
